Export.Routine:
UPRNX ; ; ; GET DELTA'S ; K ^PS S F="D:\TEMP\files\APR-2019\ID24_LPI_Records.csv" C F O F:"R" U F R STR F U F R STR Q:STR="" D .S UPRN=$P(STR,",",4) .U 0 W !,UPRN .S ^PS("LPI",UPRN)="" .Q C F quit ; ; UPRN-58 ; Provide an ABP baseline with subsequent Epoch(s) to summarise change STT ; K ^ARCHIVE D BLPU(67),STREET(67),DPA(67),LPI(67),CLASS(67) D GENBASE^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\baseline-24042019\","ID15_StreetDesc_Records.csv","^STREET","ID15_StreetDesc_Records.new.csv",67) D GENBASE^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\baseline-24042019\","ID21_BLPU_Records.csv","^BLPU","ID21_BLPU_Records.new.csv",67) D GENBASE^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\baseline-24042019\","ID24_LPI_Records.csv","^LPI","ID24_LPI_Records.new.csv",67) D GENBASE^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\baseline-24042019\","ID28_DPA_Records.csv","^DPA","ID28_DPA_Records.new.csv",67) D GENBASE^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\baseline-24042019\","ID32_Class_Records.csv","^CLASS","ID32_Class_Records.new.csv",67)
B D BLPU(68),STREET(68),DPA(68),LPI(68),CLASS(68) D GENBASE^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\newbaseline\","ID15_StreetDesc_Records.67.csv","^STREET","ID15_StreetDesc_Records.new.csv",68) D GENBASE^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\newbaseline\","ID21_BLPU_Records.67.csv","^BLPU","ID21_BLPU_Records.new.csv",68) D GENBASE^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\newbaseline\","ID24_LPI_Records.67.csv","^LPI","ID24_LPI_Records.new.csv",68) D GENBASE^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\newbaseline\","ID28_DPA_Records.67.csv","^DPA","ID28_DPA_Records.new.csv",68) D GENBASE^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\newbaseline\","ID32_Class_Records.67.csv","^CLASS","ID32_Class_Records.new.csv",68)
C D BLPU(69),STREET(69),DPA(69),LPI(69),CLASS(69) D GENBASE^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\newbaseline\","ID15_StreetDesc_Records.67.csv","^STREET","ID15_StreetDesc_Records.new.csv",69) D GENBASE^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\newbaseline\","ID21_BLPU_Records.67.csv","^BLPU","ID21_BLPU_Records.new.csv",69) D GENBASE^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\newbaseline\","ID24_LPI_Records.67.csv","^LPI","ID24_LPI_Records.new.csv",69) D GENBASE^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\newbaseline\","ID28_DPA_Records.67.csv","^DPA","ID28_DPA_Records.new.csv",69) D GENBASE^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\newbaseline\","ID32_Class_Records.67.csv","^CLASS","ID32_Class_Records.new.csv",69) D ARCHIVE QUIT
BLPU(EPOCH) K ^BLPU
;S FILE="D:\47\ID21_BLPU_Records.csv" S FILE="D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\epoch"_EPOCH_"\ID21_BLPU_Records.csv" CLOSE FILE O FILE:"R" F U FILE R STR Q:$ZEOF D .;U 0 W !,STR .S UPRN=$P(STR,",",4) .I $D(^BLPU(UPRN)) BREAK .S ^BLPU(UPRN)=STR .QUIT C FILE QUIT
STREET(EPOCH) K ^STREET ;S FILE="D:\47\ID15_StreetDesc_Records.csv" S FILE="D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\epoch"_EPOCH_"\ID15_StreetDesc_Records.csv" CLOSE FILE O FILE:"R" F U FILE R STR Q:$ZEOF D .;U 0 W !,STR .S UPRN=$P(STR,",",4) .;U 0 W !,UPRN .I $D(^STREET(UPRN)) BREAK .S ^STREET(UPRN)=STR .QUIT C FILE
QUIT
; D GENBASE^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\baseline-24042019\","ID15_StreetDesc_Records.csv","^STREET","ID15_StreetDesc_Records.new.csv",67) ; D GENBASE^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\baseline-24042019\","ID21_BLPU_Records.csv","^BLPU","ID21_BLPU_Records.new.csv",67) ; D GENBASE^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\baseline-24042019\","ID24_LPI_Records.csv","^LPI","ID24_LPI_Records.new.csv",67) ; D GENBASE^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\baseline-24042019\","ID28_DPA_Records.csv","^DPA","ID28_DPA_Records.new.csv",67) ; D GENBASE^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\baseline-24042019\","ID32_Class_Records.csv","^CLASS","ID32_Class_Records.new.csv",67) GENBASE(BDIR,B,G1,NEW,EPOCH) ; MERGE DELTAS INTO BASELINE K ^UPDATES,^DELETES,^INSERTS ;S F="D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\baseline-24042019\ID15_StreetDesc_Records.csv" ;S F="D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\baseline-24042019\"_B S F=BDIR_B C F O F:"R" ; LOAD BASELINE FILE F U F R STR Q:$ZEOF DO .S UPRN=$P(STR,",",4) .;S TYPE=$REPLACE($P(STR,",",2),"""","") .;S ^BSTREET(UPRN)=STR .S DSTR=$GET(@G1@(UPRN)) .I DSTR'="" DO ..S TYPE=$REPLACE($P(DSTR,",",2),"""","") ..I TYPE="U" S ^UPDATES(UPRN)=$E(G1,2,999)_"`"_DSTR ..I TYPE="D" S ^DELETES(UPRN)=$E(G1,2,999)_"`"_DSTR ..QUIT .QUIT C F
; INSERTS S UPRN="" F S UPRN=$O(@G1@(UPRN)) Q:UPRN="" DO .S DSTR=^(UPRN) .S TYPE=$REPLACE($P(DSTR,",",2),"""","") .I TYPE="I" S ^INSERTS(UPRN)=$E(G1,2,999)_"`"_DSTR .QUIT
; CREATE A NEW BASELINE ;S F="D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\newbaseline\ID15_StreetDesc_Records.new.csv" ;BREAK S NEW=$REPLACE(NEW,".new.",("."_EPOCH_".")) S F="D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\newbaseline\"_NEW C F O F:"WNS" ;S BASE="D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\baseline-24042019\ID15_StreetDesc_Records.csv" ;S BASE="D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\baseline-24042019\"_B S BASE=BDIR_B C BASE O BASE:"R" F U BASE R STR Q:$ZEOF DO .S UPRN=$P(STR,",",4) .I $D(^UPDATES(UPRN)) USE F W $PIECE(^UPDATES(UPRN),"`",2,9999),! QUIT .I $D(^DELETES(UPRN)) QUIT ; FORGET DELETES .U F W STR,! .QUIT ; INSERTS S UPRN="" F S UPRN=$O(^INSERTS(UPRN)) Q:UPRN="" U F W $P(^(UPRN),"`",2,9999),! CLOSE F,BASE ; ; ARCHIVE OF UPDATED, DELETED AND INSERTED RECORD ; F GLOB="^INSERTS","^UPDATES","^DELETES" DO .S UPRN="" .F S UPRN=$O(@GLOB@(UPRN)) Q:UPRN="" DO ..S ^ARCHIVE(UPRN,EPOCH,$E(GLOB,2))=^(UPRN) ..QUIT .QUIT
QUIT
ARCHIVE S file="D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\newbaseline\archive_"_+$H_".csv" c file o file:("wns") S (UPRN,EPOCH,CHANGE)="" F S UPRN=$O(^ARCHIVE(UPRN)) Q:UPRN="" DO .F S EPOCH=$O(^ARCHIVE(UPRN,EPOCH)) Q:EPOCH="" DO ..F S CHANGE=$O(^ARCHIVE(UPRN,EPOCH,CHANGE)) Q:CHANGE="" DO ...S STR=EPOCH_"`"_^(CHANGE) ...use file W STR,! ...QUIT close file QUIT
DPA(EPOCH) ; K ^DPA
;S FILE="D:\47\ID28_DPA_Records.csv" S FILE="D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\epoch"_EPOCH_"\ID28_DPA_Records.csv" CLOSE FILE
O FILE:"R" F U FILE R STR Q:$ZEOF D .;U 0 W !,STR .S UPRN=$P(STR,",",4) .;U 0 W !,UPRN .I $D(^DPA(UPRN)) ; BREAK .S ^DPA(UPRN)=STR .QUIT
C FILE
QUIT
LPI(EPOCH) ; K ^LPI
;S FILE="D:\47\ID24_LPI_Records.csv" S FILE="D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\epoch"_EPOCH_"\ID24_LPI_Records.csv"
CLOSE FILE
O FILE:"R" F U FILE R STR Q:$ZEOF D .;U 0 W !,STR .S UPRN=$P(STR,",",4) .;U 0 W !,UPRN .I $D(^LPI(UPRN)) ; BREAK .S ^LPI(UPRN)=STR .QUIT
C FILE
QUIT
CLASS(EPOCH) ; K ^CLASS
;S FILE="D:\47\ID32_Class_Records.csv" S FILE="D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\epoch"_EPOCH_"\ID32_Class_Records.csv" CLOSE FILE
O FILE:"R" F U FILE R STR Q:$ZEOF D .;U 0 W !,STR .S UPRN=$P(STR,",",4) .;U 0 W !,UPRN .I $D(^CLASS(UPRN)) ; BREAK .S ^CLASS(UPRN)=STR .QUIT
C FILE
QUIT
; D CHK^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\files\APR-2019\ID21_BLPU_Records.csv","d:\temp\cmp_blpu.csv","^BLPU") ; D CHK^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\files\APR-2019\ID15_StreetDesc_Records.csv","d:\temp\cmp_street.csv","^STREET") ; D CHK^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\files\APR-2019\ID28_DPA_Records.csv","d:\temp\cmp_dpa.csv","^DPA") ; D CHK^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\files\APR-2019\ID24_LPI_Records.csv","d:\temp\cmp_lpi.csv","^LPI") ; D CHK^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\files\APR-2019\ID32_Class_Records.csv","d:\temp\cmp_class.csv","^CLASS") ; ; D CHK^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\baseline-24042019\ID21_BLPU_Records.csv","d:\temp\cmp_blpu.csv","^BLPU") ; D CHK^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\baseline-24042019\ID15_StreetDesc_Records.csv","d:\temp\cmp_street.csv","^STREET") ; D CHK^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\baseline-24042019\ID28_DPA_Records.csv","d:\temp\cmp_dpa.csv","^DPA") ; D CHK^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\baseline-24042019\ID24_LPI_Records.csv","d:\temp\cmp_lpi.csv","^LPI") ; D CHK^UPRNX("D:\TEMP\abp-delta-audit-test\baseline-24042019\ID32_Class_Records.csv","d:\temp\cmp_class.csv","^CLASS") CHK(FILE,FILE2,GLOBAL)
;S FILE="D:\TEMP\files\ID21_BLPU_Records.csv" ;S FILE2="D:\TEMP\CMP_BLPU.csv"
CLOSE FILE CLOSE FILE2
O FILE2:"WNS"
O FILE:"R" U FILE R HDR U FILE2 W HDR,! F U FILE R STR Q:$ZEOF D .S UPRN=$P(STR,",",4) .;U 0 W !,UPRN .I $D(@GLOBAL@(UPRN)) D ..S BLPU=@GLOBAL@(UPRN) ..S STR=$REPLACE(STR,"""","") ..S BLPU=$REPLACE(BLPU,"""","") ..U FILE2 W !,STR,! ..F I=1:1:$P(STR,",") DO ...I $P(STR,",",I)'=$P(BLPU,",",I) U FILE2 W "*",$P(BLPU,",",I),"," ...ELSE U FILE2 W $P(STR,",",I),"," ...Q ..;U 0 W ! R *Y ..U FILE2 W ! ..Q .QUIT C FILE C FILE2 QUIT
FILE ; K ^PS S FILE="D:\TEMP\files\APR-2019\ID21_BLPU_Records.csv" C FILE O FILE:"R" S C=0 for i=1:1 use FILE read z q:$zeof S S=$P($H,",",2),Q=$O(^PS(S,""),-1 )+1 S ^PS(S,Q)=$h_"~"_z S C=C+1 I C#10000=0 u 0 W !,z CLOSE FILE QUIT
CNT ; K ^CNT S S="",Q="" F S S=$O(^PS(S)) Q:S="" D .F S Q=$O(^PS(S,Q)) Q:Q="" D ..S T=$$HT^STDDATE(S) ..S ^CNT(T)=$G(^CNT(T))+1 ..S ^CNT(T,"Q")=Q ..Q .Q QUIT
API ; K ^MISS,^HIT S FILE="D:\TEMP\cmp_dpa.csv" CLOSE FILE O FILE:"R" U FILE R HDR F U FILE R STR Q:$ZEOF D .;BREAK .;U 0 W !,STR .I $P(STR,",",2)'="*U" QUIT .S UPRN=$P(STR,",",4) .S SUBBLD=$P(STR,",",8) .S BUILDING=$P(STR,",",9) .S BUILDNUM=$P(STR,",",10) .S DEPTHROUGH=$P(STR,",",11) .S THROUGHFARE=$P(STR,",",12) .S POSTTOWN=$P(STR,",",15) .S POSTCODE=$P(STR,",",16) .S ORGNAME=$P(STR,",",6) .S ADR=ORGNAME_","_SUBBLD_","_BUILDING_","_BUILDNUM_","_DEPTHROUGH_","_THROUGHFARE_","_POSTTOWN_","_POSTCODE .S ADR=$REPLACE(ADR,"*","") .U 0 .S ADR2=$REPLACE(ADR," ","%20") .S ADR2=$REPLACE(ADR2,"&","%26") .S ADR2=$REPLACE(ADR2,"-","%2D") .D GO^KEYCLOAK("A",ADR2) .S RETUPRN=$get(B("UPRN")) .I RETUPRN=UPRN S ^HIT($O(^HIT(""),-1)+1)=ADR .I RETUPRN'=UPRN DO ..U 0 W ! ..U 0 W !,ADR ..U 0 W !,RETUPRN," * ",UPRN ..S ^MISS($O(^MISS(""),-1)+1)=UPRN_"~"_RETUPRN_"~"_ADR ..;R *Y ..QUIT .QUIT CLOSE FILE QUIT
MISS ; S FILE="D:\TEMP\MISS.TXT" CLOSE FILE O FILE:"WNS" S A="" F S A=$O(^MISS(A)) Q:A="" DO .S REC=^MISS(A) .S ADR=$P(REC,"~",3),UPRN=$P(REC,"~",1),RETUPRN=$P(REC,"~",2) .USE FILE .W !,ADR .W !,"FILES UPRN:",UPRN .W !,"RETUPRN: ",RETUPRN .S ADR2=$REPLACE(ADR," ","%20") .S ADR2=$REPLACE(ADR2,"&","%26") .S ADR2=$REPLACE(ADR2,"-","%2D") .U 0 W !,ADR .D GO^KEYCLOAK("A",ADR2) .USE FILE W !,JSON(1),! .QUIT CLOSE FILE QUIT
